sourcesContent:
function BookCreate() {
  return(<form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
      <label>Description:
      <input
        type='text'
        name='Description'
        value={Description}
        onChange={handleChange}/>
    </label>
    <label>Author:
      <input
        type='text'
        name='author'
        value={author}
        onChange={handleChange}/>
    </label>
    <label>Description:
      <input
        type='text'
        rows='10'
        name='description'
        value={description}
        onChange={handleChange}/>
    </label>
    <button>Submit</button>
  </form>)
}
export default BookCreate
